channel.title: Me on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Me on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: Create 2 GitHub Projects: Project name: blog Feature: Public, NO readme.md file URL: https://github.com/fewsteps/blog.git Project name: /justtesting.github.com Fetures: Public, readme.md file create URL: https://github.com/fewsteps/justtesting.github.com Create HUGO site named as blog hugo new site blog echo "# blog" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git branch -M main git remote add origin https://github.com/fewsteps/blog.git git push -u origin main Create gitignore File Go to https://www.toptal.com/developers/gitignore and Type: VisualStudioCode, Hugo, macOS => generate file crate a .
